Rule.name: CMH-User-Name-Change-Trigger-Rule
Rule.Description:
This rule can be used for Certification Events that use rule triggers. The previousIdentity and newIdentity hold snapshots of the identity before the update has occurred and the state of the identity after the update, respectively.
This rule is used to trigger the Name change workflow when there is a change in the Firstname or Lastname for the user.

Argument.Description: The identity before the refresh/aggregation (this will be null when an identity is created).
The identity after the refresh/aggregation (this will be null when an identity is deleted).
A boolean describing the result of the rule.
